channel.title: ::pickup
channel.description: I have made my server compatible for the Silabsoft client but know I can't do ::pickup 00995 10 and get the item requested.

item.title: ::pickup
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

you have to do this too, make the 11, 12, and the 12, 13

int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));

int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

Read full topic

item.title: ::pickup
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

Works fine with all 7 of my server just have to make sure all 10,000’s are 20,000’s

Read full topic

item.title: ::pickup
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“itzkyle, post:3, topic:153992”][quote author=dragonchain link=topic=210397.msg1842729#msg1842729 date=1193293244]
Replace your :;pickup code with this:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("xx 4rm0 xx") || playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Excist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type It Right ! "); } }

That’s for classic items, now if you wan’t to pick up silab items you need this command:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“pick”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newitem =

Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));
				if (newitem >= 0) { 
							

				addItem(newitem, 1);	
				} else {
					sendMessage("No such item");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				sendMessage("Bad item ID");
			}

}[/code]

Add that under your pickup command,

Thanks,

~Armo
[/quote]

Also you an do this -.-

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("xx 4rm0 xx") || playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Excist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type It Right ! "); } }

It works fine. ;)[/quote]

No it doesn’t work mate, I tried it and alot of people ask that in teh tutorial

Read full topic

item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

[quote=“dragonchain, post:2, topic:153992”]Replace your :;pickup code with this:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("xx 4rm0 xx") || playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Excist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type It Right ! "); } }

That’s for classic items, now if you wan’t to pick up silab items you need this command:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“pick”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newitem =

Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));
				if (newitem >= 0) { 
							

				addItem(newitem, 1);	
				} else {
					sendMessage("No such item");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				sendMessage("Bad item ID");

}[/code]

Add that under your pickup command,

Thanks,

~Armo ;)[/quote]

Also you an do this -.-

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("xx 4rm0 xx") || playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Excist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type It Right ! "); } }

It works fine.

item.title: ::pickup
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

Replace your :;pickup code with this:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("xx 4rm0 xx") || playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Excist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type It Right ! "); } }

That’s for classic items, now if you wan’t to pick up silab items you need this command:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“pick”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newitem =

Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));
				if (newitem >= 0) { 
							

				addItem(newitem, 1);	
				} else {
					sendMessage("No such item");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				sendMessage("Bad item ID");
			}

}[/code]

Add that under your pickup command,

Thanks,

~Armo
